message: Hi Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a unique opportunity to own something truly special. I'm willing to sell it to you for $180. It's a great deal, and I think you'll love it!
I'm interested in the product, but $180 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $150 for it. Can you consider that?
I understand that $180 might be a bit steep for you, Bob. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer you the product for $165. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy it!
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but $165 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $155 for the product. Can you consider that?

I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're getting close to the minimum price I'm willing to accept, Bob. However, I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer you the product for $160. It's my final offer, so I hope you'll consider it!
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I'm willing to pay $152 for the product. Can you consider that?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer you the product for $158. It's my last offer, so I hope you'll consider it!
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. I'm willing to pay $150 for the product. Can you consider that?
